name: node-keys
description: High level API for key codes in node.js desktop applications. (ex: process.stdin.write(keys({ ctrl: true, name: 'c'})

scripts.prettier: npx ts-refactor organizeImports ./src ./spec --dontAsk && npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test && npm run doc

author: Sebastian Gurin
